person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night. I would welcome any suggestions you have.
animal_say: Oh no, stress can be such a bother! I know a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will help you unwind and find peace. Let's go see him!
